title: Reflective Curriculum Design Competency Enhancement Program for University Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Education Experience and Knowledge of Basic Curriculum Design
context.additional_context: A course focusing on helping in-service secondary teachers understand university instructors' curriculum design processes and apply reflective practices to their own instructional design. Operated through a combination of online learning platforms and offline workshops

learning_goals: Participants can design curricula by applying a three-stage reflective practice process (pre-, during-, and post-education).
Participants can improve curricula through an iterative design process incorporating peer feedback.
Participants can effectively integrate technology and online resources to implement curriculum design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
